body:
When did you guys start playing Avicus?
BTW Happy New Year everyone!
Anyway, I started playing Avicus about 2 years ago!
Comment below when YOU started playing Avicus and how you found it out!

replies.body:
Hey Alicia, Happy New Year to you too!
Is it really necessary to create 3 new threads in 5 minutes?
Its great to see you trying to communicate with the community more but it does spam the forums.
We have had many threads like this before, in the future search before making these posts.
Thanks!
